name: Detailed Course on Limits, Continuity & Differentiability for JEE 2024
description: In this course, Vineet Loomba Sir will provide in-depth knowledge of Limits, Continuity and Differentiability. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for IIT JEE. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. The course will be completed in approximately 1 month which comprises 15 classes with a duration of 90 minutes each. The course will be conducted in Hindi and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Methods of Evaluation of Limits - Part I
Methods of Evaluation of Limits - Part II
Theorems on Continuity of Functions and Problems
Differentiability in an Interval and Theorems
Miscellaneous Problems and PYQs - Part I
Miscellaneous Problems and PYQs - Part II & Doubt Clearing

author.bio: A game-changer in Mathematics, produced 100 percentilers in 2021/2022/2023, his courses are regarded as the Benchmark for IIT JEE aspirants.
